summary: All logs from activities are associated with the same trace_id from application startup instead of being correctly traced to individual workflow executions when using OpenTelemetry integration with Temporal.
userImpact: Users cannot properly trace activities through OpenTelemetry as all logs show the same trace_id from application startup rather than the actual workflow execution trace.
rootCause: Likely missing root span creation for workflows or incorrect trace context propagation to activity logs
resolutionDetails: Duplicate of issue #1425; see comment for reference implementation
keyQuote: all logs in activities are related to the same trace_id which is the one of the startup of my app
